articles.title: ‘Masquerading in plain sight’: Why there’s no quick fix to Australian sport’s racism fight - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The case of Heritier Lumumba is just the latest in a long line of examples of Australian sport’s awkward reckoning with racism.
articles.content: Lumumbas case is directly linked to the shameful Adam Goodes saga: the racism he experienced, after all, intensified once he took McGuire to task on national television over his misguided comments on… [+7142 chars]
